seo: 宏景eHR,任意文件读取,DownLoadCourseware,漏洞检测
seo_en: Hongjing eHR, arbitrary file read, DownLoadCourseware, vulnerability detection
summary: 该插件用于检测宏景eHR系统的DownLoadCourseware功能是否存在任意文件读取漏洞
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the DownLoadCourseware function of Hongjing eHR system has arbitrary file read vulnerability
